name: treatment of used beverage cans, for recycling, unsorted, sorting | aluminium scrap, post-consumer, prepared for melting | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/22878/documentation

This activity represents the treatment of used beverage cans (UBCs) from separate collection, i.e., a source-segregated municipal solid waste fraction, through sorting for recycling. The sorting of 'used beverage cans' yields 'aluminium scrap, post-consumer, prepared for melting' which is typically used for the production of aluminium, wrought alloy (Haupt et al. (2018)). ;Source: ;Melanie Haupt, Thomas KÃ¤gi, Stefanie Hellweg, Life cycle inventories of waste management processes, Data in Brief, Volume 19, 2018, Pages 1441-1457, https://doi.org/10.1016/j.dib.2018.05.067.

The activity starts with 'used beverage cans' being available to the sorting facility. Collection of this 'used beverage cans, for recycling' is documented in the respective market for this waste.

The activity ends with 'used beverage cans' being sorted and 'aluminium scrap, post-consumer, prepared for melting' being available for transportation at the gates of the sorting facility.
category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/383:Materials recovery/3830:Materials recovery

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Data mainly reflecting situation in Switzerland in 2012.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data are sourced from plants located or activities taking place in Switzerland and/or relevant literature sources.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Technology encountered in CH for the underlying time frame.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: Used beverage cans (UBCs) are partly collected separately, but also undergo a sorting similar to the mixed aluminium to ensure that no other metals than aluminium are included. Therefore, UBC collection and sorting was approximated with tinplate collection and sorting.
